name: Launch, Market and Monetize a Podcast
seo_title: How to Launch a Podcast on a Budget | Learn from Fiverr
seo_description: Learn how to launch a Podcast on a budget with Sam Laliberte and transition from aspiring podcaster to a credible producer and host in just a few hours. Exclusively on Fiverr
description: With a global audience growing quickly, there has never been a better time to start a branded podcast. This course covers essential equipment, booking guests, editing, attracting sponsors & how to monetize your show using expert marketing techniques.
